June 21st - 23rd, Saarbrücken

About TaCoS 29

We are excited to host the TaCoS (Tagung der Computerlinguistik-Studierenden) in Saarbrücken in 2019. TaCoS is a conference series dating back to the 90s that is open to any student interested in the areas of computational linguistics and its neighboring applied and theoretical disciplines from psycholinguistics to computer science. TaCoS is a conference organized for and by students.

If you have performed some interesting research (a thesis, Hiwi job, personal or in-class project), please consider presenting it.

While TaCoS is mainly of scientific exchange, it’s also a great place to get to know each other better.

We hope to welcome as many of you as possible and hope you’ll have a great time here in Saarbrücken.
